title: Artem Ohanian
text:
Hi there!
Welcome to my personal website dedicated to all things social and statistical. Feel free to explore what I do and contact me for any inquiries.



Work
Research Intern at International Laboratory for Applied Network Research (HSE, Moscow) | 2023 - present
Research Intern at International Laboratory for Social Integration Research HSE Moscow | 2022-2023
Research Intern at Center for Cultural Sociology HSE Moscow | 2021


Education
MS in Comparative Social Research, Ronald F. Inglehart Laboratory for Comparative Social Research (HSE, Moscow) | 2022-2024
BS in Sociology, Faculty of Social Sciences (HSE, Moscow) | 2018-2022
